title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 September 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:14 <coud> has quit  
00:47 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
03:55 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:56 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:06 <ries> has quit  
08:10 <coud> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <vmassol> has quit  
09:49 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <coud> vmassol Hi, at http://rendering.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/GettingStarted#HSettingupyourClasspath in the list of needed jars there should probably be "xwiki-commons-component-api" included. Without this jar compiler was missing ComponentLookupException class.  
10:08 <vmassol> coud: ok thanks. You're setting it manually without Maven and not using the standalone jar?  
10:25 <coud> vmassol yes. I need wiki syntax parsing in my application which is built as set of eclipse bundles. When I converted standalone jar to eclipse bundle I got some strange errors probably related to classpath relocation.  
10:54 <vmassol> ok  
12:19 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
12:29 <npm\_\_> has quit  
12:29 <npm\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:06 <vmassol> coud: I don't have time now but I'll fix the 'setting up your cp' section later on. I've noticed it's not up to date with some changes we've made recently. Also I need to find a way to make it easier to get the jars for non maven users.  
13:06 <vmassol> gtg  
13:06 <vmassol> has quit  
13:20 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:21 <vmassol> has quit  
15:38 <cjd> has quit  
16:15 <CIA-121> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r0421fb4 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0421fb45bd2d7c159ae47056a6e8ed7e17efd665 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-search/xwiki-platform-search-ui/src/main/resources/Main/LuceneSearch.xml : XWIKI-8191: Limiting search to a space that contains whitespace in its name doesn't work as expected - http://git.io/48fcPQ  
16:19 <@sdumitriu> x = m\*(z\*l\*s + 1)\*\*(1/l)  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> z=-1.8807936080611456  x=5.9 m=6.93  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> z=-0.6744897501292214  x=6.55 m=6.93  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> z=0 x=6.93 m=6.93  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> z=0.6744897501292214  x=7.27 m=6.93  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> z=1.8807936080611445  x=7.97 m=6.93  
16:24 <@sdumitriu> Ah, sorry about that, wrong window  
16:27 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:11 <ries> has joined #xwiki  
17:28 <vmassol> coud: ok I've updated the doc (haven't found an easy way to get you all the required deps and their transitive deps easily without running maven - with maven it's easy: mvn assembly:single -DdescriptorId=jar-with-dependencies  
17:31 <coud> vmassol thanks. I think I will actually use maven.  
17:32 <vmassol> ok cool  
17:32 <coud> I'm now reading sonatype's osgi/maven cookbook http://www.sonatype.com/books/mcookbook/reference/index.html  
17:34 <vmassol> a good book to get started...  
17:34 <vmassol> I wrote 2 maven books myself but they're now a bit oldish ;)  
17:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
19:03 <CIA-121> Vincent Massol master \* r296c1dc https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/296c1dc4f5dd9b3e82488b78e0d88f73a62f79ec / xwiki-rendering-standalone/src/it/example/src/test/java/org/xwiki/rendering/example/ExampleTest.java : [Misc] Update to XWiki Syntax 2.1 now that it's final - http://git.io/jGSu0w  
19:34 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
19:34 <evalica1> has quit  
19:43 <vmassol> hmm no clue why this is failing: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/org.xwiki.rendering$xwiki-rendering-standalone/982/console  
19:43 <vmassol> (builds fine locally btw)  
19:43 <vmassol> if you have any idea...
